verses.t: At that time{H6256} Lordthe {H3068} said{H559} unto me, Hew{H6458} thee two{H8147} tables{H3871} of stone{H68} like unto the first{H7223}, and come up{H5927} unto me into the mount{H2022}, and make{H6213} thee an ark{H727} of wood{H6086}.
And I will write{H3789} on the tables{H3871} the words{H1697} that were in the first{H7223} tables{H3871} which thou brakest{H7665}, and thou shalt put{H7760} them in the ark{H727}.

And I made{H6213} an ark{H727} of shittim{H7848} wood{H6086}, and hewed{H6458} two{H8147} tables{H3871} of stone{H68} like unto the first{H7223}, and went up{H5927} into the mount{H2022}, having the two{H8147} tables{H3871} in mine hand{H3027}.

And he wrote{H3789} on the tables{H3871}, according to the first{H7223} writing{H4385}, the ten{H6235} commandments{H1697}, Lordwhich the {H3068} spake{H1696} unto you in the mount{H2022} out of the midst{H8432} of the fire{H784} in the day{H3117} of the assembly{H6951}: Lordand the {H3068} gave{H5414} them unto me.commandments: Heb. words

And I turned{H6437} myself and came down{H3381} from the mount{H2022}, and put{H7760} the tables{H3871} in the ark{H727} which I had made{H6213}; Lordand there they be, as the {H3068} commanded{H6680} me.

And the children{H1121} of Israel{H3478} took their journey{H5265} from Beeroth of the children of Jaakan{H885} to Mosera{H4149}: there Aaron{H175} died{H4191}, and there he was buried{H6912}; and Eleazar{H499} his son{H1121}ministered in the priest's office{H3547} in his stead.
From thence they journeyed{H5265} unto Gudgodah{H1412}; and from Gudgodah{H1412} to Jotbath{H3193}, a land{H776} of rivers{H5158} of waters{H4325}.

At that time{H6256} Lordthe {H3068} separated{H914} the tribe{H7626} of Levi{H3878}, to bear{H5375} the ark{H727} of the covenant{H1285} Lordof the {H3068}, to stand{H5975} before{H6440} Lordthe {H3068} to minister{H8334} unto him, and to bless{H1288} in his name{H8034}, unto this day{H3117}.
Wherefore Levi{H3878} hath no part{H2506} nor inheritance{H5159} with his brethren{H251}; Lordthe {H3068} is his inheritance{H5159}, Lordaccording as the {H3068} thy God{H430} promised{H1696} him.

And I stayed{H5975} in the mount{H2022}, according to the first{H7223} time{H3117}, forty{H705} days{H3117} and forty{H705} nights{H3915}; Lordand the {H3068} hearkened{H8085} unto me at that time{H6471} also, and Lordthe {H3068} would{H14} not destroy{H7843} thee.first…: or, former days

LordAnd the {H3068} said{H559} unto me, Arise{H6965}, take{H3212} thy journey{H4550} before{H6440} the people{H5971}, that they may go in{H935} and possess{H3423} the land{H776}, which I sware{H7650} unto their fathers{H1} to give{H5414} unto them.take…: Heb. go in journey

And now, Israel{H3478}, Lordwhat doth the {H3068} thy God{H430} require{H7592} of thee, but to fear{H3372} Lordthe {H3068} thy God{H430}, to walk{H3212} in all his ways{H1870}, and to love{H157} him, and to serve{H5647} Lordthe {H3068} thy God{H430} with all thy heart{H3824} and with all thy soul{H5315},
To keep{H8104} the commandments{H4687} Lordof the {H3068}, and his statutes{H2708}, which I command{H6680} thee this day{H3117} for thy good{H2896}?
Behold, the heaven{H8064} and the heaven{H8064} of heavens{H8064} is Lord'sthe {H3068} thy God{H430}, the earth{H776} also, with all that therein is.
LordOnly the {H3068} had a delight{H2836} in thy fathers{H1} to love{H157} them, and he chose{H977} their seed{H2233} after{H310} them, even you above all people{H5971}, as it is this day{H3117}.
Circumcise{H4135} therefore the foreskin{H6190} of your heart{H3824}, and be no more stiffnecked{H7185}.

LordFor the {H3068} your God{H430} is God{H430} of gods{H430}, and Lord{H113} of lords{H113}, a great{H1419} God{H410}, a mighty{H1368}, and a terrible{H3372}, which regardeth{H5375} not persons{H6440}, nor taketh{H3947} reward{H7810}:
He doth execute{H6213} the judgment{H4941} of the fatherless{H3490} and widow{H490}, and loveth{H157} the stranger{H1616}, in giving{H5414} him food{H3899} and raiment{H8071}.
Love{H157} ye therefore the stranger{H1616}: for ye were strangers{H1616} in the land{H776} of Egypt{H4714}.
Thou shalt fear{H3372} Lordthe {H3068} thy God{H430}; him shalt thou serve{H5647}, and to him shalt thou cleave{H1692}, and swear{H7650} by his name{H8034}.
He is thy praise{H8416}, and he is thy God{H430}, that hath done{H6213} for thee these great{H1419} and terrible things{H3372}, which thine eyes{H5869} have seen{H7200}.

Thy fathers{H1} went down{H3381} into Egypt{H4714} with threescore and ten{H7657} persons{H5315}; Lordand now the {H3068} thy God{H430} hath made{H7760} thee as the stars{H3556} of heaven{H8064} for multitude{H7230}.
